newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: South Africa's Mandela arrives in Philippines.
newsitem.headline: South Africa's Mandela arrives in Philippines.

text.p: South African president Nelson Mandela arrived in the Philippines on Saturday for a two-day official visit.
Mandela was received by Philippine President Fidel Ramos at the presidential palace and was scheduled to hold talks on expanding trade and investment links between the two countries.
Mandela leads a 50-man business delegation in his eight-day tour of four southeast Asian nations aimed at establishing closer ties with the emerging economic tigers.
He leaves for Brunei on Monday and will then visit Malaysia and Singapore before returning to South Africa.
